event.description: Steve Pearce strikes out swinging.
Josh Donaldson flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Jose Bautista walks.
Kendrys Morales flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Troy Tulowitzki lines out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Russell Martin strikes out swinging.
Justin Smoak called out on strikes.
Kevin Pillar lines out sharply to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Darwin Barney singles on a line drive to left fielder Mallex Smith.
Steve Pearce strikes out swinging.
Josh Donaldson walks. Darwin Barney to 2nd.
Jose Bautista walks. Darwin Barney to 3rd. Josh Donaldson to 2nd.
Kendrys Morales hits a grand slam (1) to left center field. Darwin Barney scores. Josh Donaldson scores. Jose Bautista scores.
Troy Tulowitzki pops out to catcher Jesus Sucre in foul territory.
Russell Martin flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Justin Smoak grounds out, shortstop Tim Beckham to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Kevin Pillar flies out to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Darwin Barney walks.
Steve Pearce grounds into a double play, pitcher Blake Snell to second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison. Darwin Barney out at 2nd.
Josh Donaldson strikes out swinging.
Jose Bautista flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Kendrys Morales grounds out, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Troy Tulowitzki lines out to shortstop Tim Beckham.
Russell Martin walks.
Justin Smoak singles on a line drive to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier. Russell Martin to 3rd.
Kevin Pillar flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Darwin Barney reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by first baseman Logan Morrison. Russell Martin scores. Justin Smoak to 2nd. Missed catch error by first baseman Logan Morrison.
Steve Pearce flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr. Justin Smoak to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Tommy Hunter replaces Blake Snell.
Josh Donaldson called out on strikes.
Jose Bautista grounds out to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Kendrys Morales strikes out swinging.
Troy Tulowitzki strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Danny Farquhar replaces Tommy Hunter.
Russell Martin grounds out sharply, third baseman Evan Longoria to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Justin Smoak grounds out, second baseman Brad Miller to first baseman Logan Morrison.
Kevin Pillar singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier.
Darwin Barney singles on a ground ball to shortstop Tim Beckham. Kevin Pillar to 2nd.
Ezequiel Carrera flies out to right fielder Steven Souza Jr.
Corey Dickerson strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kiermaier strikes out swinging.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Brad Miller strikes out swinging.
Steven Souza Jr. singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Jose Bautista.
Logan Morrison grounds into a double play, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Justin Smoak. Steven Souza Jr. out at 2nd.
Tim Beckham called out on strikes.
Mallex Smith bunt grounds out softly, catcher Russell Martin to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Jesus Sucre grounds out, third baseman Josh Donaldson to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Corey Dickerson lines out to left fielder Steve Pearce.
Kevin Kiermaier walks.
Evan Longoria walks. Kevin Kiermaier to 2nd.
Brad Miller grounds into a double play, second baseman Darwin Barney to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Justin Smoak. Evan Longoria out at 2nd.
Steven Souza Jr. doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Steve Pearce.
Logan Morrison grounds out sharply, second baseman Darwin Barney to first baseman Justin Smoak. Steven Souza Jr. to 3rd.
Rays challenged (home-plate collision), call on the field was upheld: Tim Beckham reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher Marcus Stroman to catcher Russell Martin. Steven Souza Jr. out at home.
Mallex Smith grounds out, third baseman Josh Donaldson to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Jesus Sucre grounds out, third baseman Josh Donaldson to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Corey Dickerson singles on a line drive to center fielder Kevin Pillar.
Kevin Kiermaier grounds into a double play, pitcher Marcus Stroman to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Justin Smoak. Corey Dickerson out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Ezequiel Carrera replaces left fielder Steve Pearce, batting 1st, playing left field.
Evan Longoria singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Kevin Pillar.
Brad Miller singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Ezequiel Carrera. Evan Longoria to 2nd.
Steven Souza Jr. flies out to right fielder Jose Bautista.
Logan Morrison singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Jose Bautista. Evan Longoria scores. Brad Miller to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Joe Biagini replaces Marcus Stroman.
Tim Beckham grounds into a double play, third baseman Josh Donaldson to first baseman Justin Smoak. Brad Miller out at 3rd.
Mallex Smith flies out to left fielder Ezequiel Carrera.
Jesus Sucre grounds out, second baseman Darwin Barney to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Corey Dickerson doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Jose Bautista.
Kevin Kiermaier grounds out sharply to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Pitching Change: Joe Smith replaces Joe Biagini.
Evan Longoria flies out to right fielder Jose Bautista.
Brad Miller walks.
Steven Souza Jr. doubles (2) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Ezequiel Carrera. Brad Miller to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Jason Grilli replaces Joe Smith.
With Logan Morrison batting, wild pitch by Jason Grilli, Brad Miller scores. Steven Souza Jr. to 3rd.
Logan Morrison strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Rickie Weeks Jr. replaces Tim Beckham.
Rickie Weeks Jr. strikes out swinging.
